Package com.ingenico.connect.gateway.sdk.client.android.sdk.session

Class SessionEncryptionHelper

java.lang.Object
com.ingenico.connect.gateway.sdk.client.android.sdk.session.SessionEncryptionHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
EncryptDataAsyncTask.OnEncryptDataCompleteListener, PublicKeyAsyncTask.OnPublicKeyLoadedListener
@Deprecated public class SessionEncryptionHelper extends Object implements EncryptDataAsyncTask.OnEncryptDataCompleteListener, PublicKeyAsyncTask.OnPublicKeyLoadedListener
Deprecated.
This class will become internal to the SDK. Use ConnectSDK.encryptPaymentRequest(PaymentRequest, Success, Failure) for encryption instead.
SessionEncryptionHelper contains methods needed to encrypt a Session related data.

  • Constructor Details

    • SessionEncryptionHelper

      public SessionEncryptionHelper(PaymentRequest paymentRequest, String clientSessionId, Map<String,String> metaData, SessionEncryptionHelper.OnPaymentRequestPreparedListener listener)
      Deprecated.
      Helper for encrypting the PaymentRequest.
      Parameters:
      paymentRequest - the PaymentRequest that will be encrypted
      clientSessionId - the sessionId that is used to communicate with the GC gateway
      metaData - the metadata which is sent to the GC gateway
      listener - SessionEncryptionHelper.OnPaymentRequestPreparedListener that will be called when encryption is completed
